title: Nonverbal communication (TEFC)
creator_credit: Harper & Row, Stanley Milgram and Harry From
brief_description: Examines scientific findings on communication through gesture, body posture, intonation, eye contact, and facial expression. Includes interviews with experts on interpersonal distance, the equilibrium theory of eye contact, sex differences in the perception of nonverbal behaviour, gestures and expression in photos, and biological programing.
